alert.note: Alert for Iron (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 4:00PM EST until December 25 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, moderate snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow of 1 to 2 inches expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph into at least early evening, then slowly diminishing. * WHERE...Iron County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling.
